goal: Improve file tracking to exclude node_modules and support multiple file extensions (TypeScript, JavaScript) in addition to Python

contains.name: DEFAULT_EXCLUDE_PATTERNS
contains.description: Default patterns to exclude from file tracking (includes node_modules)

contains.name: DEFAULT_SOURCE_EXTENSIONS
contains.description: Default file extensions to search for source files (py, ts, tsx, js, jsx)

contains.name: find_source_files
contains.description: Find source files with configurable extensions (defaults to DEFAULT_SOURCE_EXTENSIONS)
